Select your main language for the app: Select your main language for the app
Add vocabulary pairs (one per line, form: Add vocabulary pairs (one per line, format: source | target)
No vocabulary entries yet. Add some word: No vocabulary entries yet. Add some words first.
Both source and target are required.
Enter words in both columns to add a pai: Enter words in both columns to add a pair.
All entries are correct. Add more words: All entries are correct. Add more words or practice again later.
No reviews due today. Add more words or: No reviews due today. Add more words or practice again later.
All answers correct in both directions. Well done!
You had wrong answers. Don't forget to r: You had wrong answers. Don't forget to review them later.
Use a mock date for testing reviews. Adv: Use a mock date for testing reviews. Advance the day to see due items change.
Paste one pair per line in the form: sou: Paste one pair per line in the form: source | target. Empty lines are ignored.
Skipped {{count}} invalid line (missing: Skipped {{count}} invalid line (missing or empty source or target).
Skipped {{count}} invalid lines (missing: Skipped {{count}} invalid lines (missing or empty source or target).
No valid pairs in paste. Use format: sou: No valid pairs in paste. Use format: source | target (one per line).
Scan the QR code or click to copy: Scan the QR code or click to copy
Relay changed. Click Refresh to update t: Relay changed. Click Refresh to update the QR code.
On Android you can open your signer app: On Android you can open your signer app directly.
Use your device passkey (Face ID, Touch: Use your device passkey (Face ID, Touch ID, or security key) to sign in.
I don't have a Nostr account or signer y: I don't have a Nostr account or signer yet
I already use Nostr and want to connect: I already use Nostr and want to connect
Find a Nostr browser extension (e.g. Que: Find a Nostr browser extension (e.g. Quetta) and install it.
Get Amber from GitHub or the Play Store: Get Amber from GitHub or the Play Store to use as a remote signer.
Generate a key and encrypt it with a pas: Generate a key and encrypt it with a password. Works on every platform.
Use your device passkey (Face ID, Touch: Use your device passkey (Face ID, Touch ID, or security key). Browser only.
Sign in with your browser extension (e.g: Sign in with your browser extension (e.g. Quetta). Desktop or Android with Quetta.
Open the NIP-55 flow to connect your And: Open the NIP-55 flow to connect your Android signer.
Paste your ncryptsec and enter your pass: Paste your ncryptsec and enter your password to unlock.
Verify with your passkey or set one up f: Verify with your passkey or set one up first.
Scan the QR code with your signer app or: Scan the QR code with your signer app or copy the URI.
Password backup warning: You must back up your password (and for new keys, the ncryptsec if you store it elsewhere). There is no recovery if the password is forgotten or lost.
